name: Wacky Bunny
description:
Wacky Bunny is a completely wacky game that is totally out of control!  Do your best to control Mr. Wacky Bunny using the current controls.  But be careful!  The controls will change throughout the game as you play.

Note: I didn't have time to implement a "quit game" feature, so just hit ALT+F4 to close the game :)

For now, you can track development on GitHub: https://github.com/Hades948/OutOfControl

Or on Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/hades948

Or on Trello: https://trello.com/b/jxiVkH5d/gmtk-2020
